类 Talk

  • java.lang.Object
    • Talk
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable
    直接已知子类:
    ClientTalk, HallTalk

    public abstract class Talk
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    class: create two different login server.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      protected class  Talk.TalkTask
      class: timer task.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected static net.sf.json.JSONObject clientConnection
      create a client connection.
      protected static net.sf.json.JSONObject hallServerConnection
      create a hall server connection.
      protected java.io.BufferedReader is
      variable: for buffer reading.
      protected java.io.PrintWriter os
      variable: for buffer printing.
      protected boolean runFlag
      variable: a flag to chack if the thread is running or not.
      protected java.net.Socket socket
      variable: create a socket.
      protected java.lang.Thread thread
      variable: create a thread.
      protected java.util.Timer timer
      variable: use to record connecting time.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Talk() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void add(java.lang.String type, java.net.Socket socket)
      function: use to create new threads.
      abstract void run()
      default abstract TODO function for HallTalk and Client Talk.
      void start(java.net.Socket sockett)
      function: start the thread.
      protected void stop()
      function: disconnect.
      (专用程序包) abstract void task()
      abstract task for HallTalk and ClientTalk.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • add

        public static void add(java.lang.String type,
       java.net.Socket socket)
        function: use to create new threads.
        参数:
        type - : hall type

      • start

        public final void start(java.net.Socket sockett)
        function: start the thread.
        参数:
        sockett -

        default abstract TODO function for HallTalk and Client Talk.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable

        abstract task for HallTalk and ClientTalk.

        function: disconnect.
